snippet: Ms. Gingrow’s show, “All the money IS in the label,” depicts gallery labels on paintings, but with a witty twist: Many of the titles seem to be quoting inane conversations overheard at exhibition openings.
abstract: Ken Johnson reviews paintings by Alex Gingrow at Mike Weiss gallery.
lead_paragraph: Ms. Gingrow’s show, “All the money IS in the label,” depicts gallery labels on paintings, but with a witty twist: Many of the titles seem to be quoting inane conversations overheard at exhibition openings.

headline.seo: ‘All the money IS in the label’
headline.print_headline: Alex Gingrow: ‘All the money IS in the label’
